channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6890, MT6990, MT7622
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6890, MT6990, MT7622

item.title: CVE-2024-20072|2024-06-03T02:04:53.505Z -- MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6890, MT6990, MT7622
item.description: In wlan driver, there is a possible out of bounds write due to improper input validation. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: WCNCR00364732; Issue ID: MSV-1332.

item.title: CVE-2024-20071|2024-06-03T02:04:51.932Z -- MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6890, MT6990, MT7622
item.description: In wlan driver, there is a possible out of bounds read due to improper input validation. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: WCNCR00364733; Issue ID: MSV-1331.
